English:
It's no use!
That thing won't come off!
Chinese:
糟糕！
沒辦法把這傢伙扒下來……！
Korean:
안 돼!
이 녀석 떨어지질 않아…!
German:
Es hilft nichts!
Wir kriegen es nicht ab!

English:
Is it okay for us to take this thing down like
this?
Chinese: 可、可以就這樣打倒它嗎！？
German: Was, wenn wir das Vieh so umhauen, wie es ist?

English:
What'll happen to Yuuko if we do that?!
You don't think it would...
Chinese:
小悠子她……會變成怎樣！？
該不會……和這傢伙一起……！？
Korean:
유콧치는… 어떻게 되는 거야!?
설마… 이 녀석과 함께…!?
German:
Was würde dann mit Yuuko passieren?!
Du glaubst doch nicht ...

English: No, no... We can't let that happen!
German: Nein, nein! Das dürfen wir nicht zulassen!

English: Eaters are digital entities... which means...
Chinese: 侵食者是數碼型態……也就是說……！？

English:
You're not thinking of Connection Jumping into an
Eater?!
Chinese: 難道……你打算對侵食者登入跳躍！？
German:
Du willst nicht ernsthaft einen Verbindungssprung
in einen Verschlinger wagen?!

English:
I don't care... Do whatever it takes...
Help her!
Chinese:
怎、怎樣都好……怎樣胡來都沒關係……
請救救……悠子……！
Korean:
뭐, 뭐든 좋아… 어떤 터무니없는 방법이라도 좋으니까…
유코를… 구해줘…!
German:
Mir gleich ... Tu, was immer du tun musst ...
Hilf ihr!

English:
It's going to be okay, Fei.
I will go in your stead.
Chinese:
不要緊的，菲。
我們會代替妳去救她的。
German:
Es wird alles gut, Fei.
Ich gehe an deiner Stelle.

English:
What? I didn't issue no command like that!
What kind of program acts on its own?!
Chinese:
咦……？我、我沒有下那樣子的命令啊……！
為什麼程式擅自……！
Korean:
…에? 그, 그런 명령, 내는 안 내렸어…!
어째서 프로그램이 멋대로…!
German:
Wie? So einen Befehl habe ich nicht gegeben!
Was für ein Programm handelt denn eigenständig?!

English:
It's okay, Fei. Trust your Digimon. It's like I
said. Digimon are not just programs.
Chinese:
菲，沒事的……相信妳的數碼寶貝。
我說過吧？數碼寶貝不單單只是程式而已。
Korean:
괜찮아 페이… 너의 디지몬을 믿어
말했잖아? 디지몬은 단순한 프로그램이 아니라고
German:
Ist schon in Ordnung, Fei. Vertraue deinen
Digimon. Wie gesagt. Sie sind nicht nur Programme.
